title: The Tajik people: pottery making
creator_credit: Julien Bryan, International Film Foundation and Hermann Schlenker
brief_description: This film shows the potters of the village of Kulala, who are Tajik tribesmen in the Afghanistan mountains. Native music is used instead of English commentary or subtitles, and the film shows the preparation of the clay and the production of pots. These are traded and sold throughout Afghanistan.
